new_skill_specs.name: compare_smoothness_levels
new_skill_specs.purpose: Determine if the target color has the highest smoothness level among a set of colors.
inputs: smoothness_levels: A dictionary with color names as keys and their smoothness levels as values.
target_color: The color to check for being the smoothest.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A boolean indicating if the target color is the smoothest.
edge_cases: All colors have the same smoothness level.
The target color is not in the smoothness levels dictionary.

new_skill_specs.name: map_boolean_to_option
new_skill_specs.purpose: Map the boolean result of the smoothness comparison to the corresponding multiple-choice option.
inputs: is_smoothest: A boolean indicating if the target color is the smoothest.
options: A list of multiple-choice options.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The label of the option that corresponds to the boolean result.
edge_cases: The options list does not contain 'yes' or 'no'.
